items.title: 3 Reasons to Buy Floor & Decor Stock Like There's No Tomorrow
items.description: Floor & Decor's business model earned praise from an all-time great investor, and it has large expansion plans.  In 2017, home improvement retail chain Floor & Decor Holdings (NYSE: FND) went public.  Of course, that's just an expression -- there will be a tomorrow for Floor & Decor, and I believe it will be great for shareholders.

items.title: After tear gas and street fires, a Los Angeles community cleans up as National Guard troops arrive
items.description: COMPTON, Calif. — Ernest Melendrez woke up early Sunday to shovel tear gas pellets and other charred and broken detritus from his neighborhood’s streets, the remnants of a battle between...
